summary: The Ultimate NPC Overhaul, now for the vampires and Dawnguard
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2537IG5.png[/img]
  [u][s]__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/s][/u]
[b][size=4]                                       [font=Georgia]


DESCRIPTION              [/font][/size][/b]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][u]_________________________[/u][/b]
[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#d8d8d8]This is the Dawnguard addition to my Ultimate NPC Overhaul mod, but it can be considered as a separate mod by itself[/color][color=#d8d8d8].  The original isn't required. T[/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#d8d8d8]here aren't that many NPCs in Dawnguard so I chose more selectively and based on what I felt suitable. Each NPC now have more exclusive appearances and overall, better looks. Fixes have also been made to some NPCs Bethesda didn't seem to care much about, like the slaves in Castle Volkihar. Many of whom were left with default presets or unfitting looks for a slave. UNO corrects them to a more convincing look; skinny, frail and with muddied features.
The core NPCs are mainly focused on and both sides from Dawnguard and Vampires have been covered thoroughly.[/color][/font]

[b]____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b]

[font=Verdana]For further relevant info, please refer to the mod page of UNO[/font]
[font=Courier New]
[color=#ffff00][size=6][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60846/?]THE ULTIMATE NPC OVERHAUL[/url][/b][/size][/color][/font]
[s][b]_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/s]



[font=Times New Roman][size=4][u]REQUIREMENTS           [/u][b] [/b]
[u][b]______________________[/b][/u][/size][size=5][b] [/b][/size][size=4]     [/size][/font]

[size=3][color=#efefef]
ApachiiSkyHair Main v1.5 (ApachiiHair.esm)
ApachiiSkyHair for Females v1.5 (ApachiiHairFemales.esm)
ApachiiSkyHair for Males v1.2  (ApachiiHairMales.esm)
KS Hairdos 400 (KSHairdo's.esp) 
SG Hairs 268 
Eyes of Beauty [/color][/size]
[u][b][size=4]
RECOMMENDED MODS    
___________________[/size][/b]
[/u]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#d8d8d8]If you want the NPCs to look similiar as shown in the screenshots you will need to download and install the following mods. These mods are [u]NOT[/u] required however; you can use any other body and skin mods as you wish.[/color][/font]

[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D2488&pUp=1][size=3]Better Males[/size][/url][color=#d8d8d8] - YoungerFacesMergedWithMenByGeonox[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563][size=3]Coverwomen[/size][/url][color=#d8d8d8] - Look 4 

OTHERS:
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35092/?][size=2]ApachiiSkyHair natural retexture [/size][/url][/b]
[/color][/b][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE [/url][/b][color=#efefef][size=3]- [/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][b]Vanilla Body[/b][/color]
author: reindeer51
